fields.description: The number of checklist items with value set to false, representing incomplete items.
fields.name: ActiveChecklistItemCount

fields.description: The categories to which the task is applied. See plannerAppliedCategories resource type for possible values.
fields.name: AppliedCategories

fields.description: Read-only. Nullable. Contains information about who archived or unarchived the task and why.
fields.name: ArchivalInfo

fields.description: Read-only. Nullable. Used to render the task correctly in the task board view when grouped by assignedTo.
fields.name: AssignedToTaskBoardFormat

fields.description: A hint that is used to order items of this type in a list view. For more information, see Using order hints in planner.
fields.name: AssigneePriority

fields.description: The set of assignees the task is assigned to.
fields.name: Assignments

fields.description: Bucket ID to which the task belongs. The bucket needs to be in the same plan as the task. The value of the bucketId property is 28 characters long and case-sensitive. Format validation is done on the service.
fields.name: BucketId

fields.description: Read-only. Nullable. Used to render the task correctly in the task board view when grouped by bucket.
fields.name: BucketTaskBoardFormat

fields.description: The number of checklist items that are present on the task.
fields.name: ChecklistItemCount

fields.description: The identity of the user that completed the task.
fields.name: CompletedBy

fields.description: Read-only. The date and time at which the 'percentComplete' of the task is set to '100'. The Timestamp type represents date and time information using ISO 8601 format and is always in UTC time. For example, midnight UTC on Jan 1, 2014 is 2014-01-01T00:00:00Z
fields.name: CompletedDateTime

fields.description: The thread ID of the conversation on the task. This is the ID of the conversation thread object created in the group.
fields.name: ConversationThreadId

fields.description: The identity of the user who created the task.
fields.name: CreatedBy

fields.description: Read-only. The date and time at which the task is created. The Timestamp type represents date and time information using ISO 8601 format and is always in UTC time. For example, midnight UTC on Jan 1, 2014 is 2014-01-01T00:00:00Z
fields.name: CreatedDateTime

fields.description: Information about the origin of the task.
fields.name: CreationSource

fields.description: Read-only. Nullable. More details about the task.
fields.name: Details

fields.description: The date and time at which the task is due. The timestamp type represents date and time information using ISO 8601 format and is always in UTC time. For example, midnight UTC on Jan 1, 2014 is 2014-01-01T00:00:00Z
fields.name: DueDateTime

fields.description: Read-only. This value is true if the details object of the task has a nonempty description. Otherwise,false.
fields.name: HasDescription

fields.description: Read-only. If set to true, the task is archived. An archived task is read-only.
fields.name: IsArchived

fields.description: Indicates whether to show this task in the MyDay view. If true, it shows the task.
fields.name: IsOnMyDay

fields.description: Read-only. The date on which task is added to or removed from MyDay.
fields.name: IsOnMyDayLastModifiedDate

fields.description: The hint used to order items of this type in a list view. For more information, see Using order hints in plannern.
fields.name: OrderHint

fields.description: The percentage of task completion. When set to 100, the task is completed.
fields.name: PercentComplete

fields.description: Plan ID to which the task belongs.
fields.name: PlanId

fields.description: The type of preview that shows up on the task. Possible values are: automatic, noPreview, checklist, description, reference.
fields.name: PreviewType

fields.description: The priority of the task. Valid values are between 0 and 10, inclusive. Larger values indicate lower priority. For example, 0 has the highest priority and 10 has the lowest priority. Currently, planner interprets values 0 and 1 as 'urgent', 2 and 3 and 4 as 'important', 5, 6, and 7 as 'medium', and 8, 9, and 10 as 'low'. Currently, planner sets the value 1 for 'urgent', 3 for 'important', 5 for 'medium', and 9 for 'low'.
fields.name: Priority

fields.description: Read-only. Nullable. Used to render the task correctly in the task board view when grouped by progress.
fields.name: ProgressTaskBoardFormat

fields.description: Defines active or inactive recurrence for the task. null when the recurrence has never been defined for the task.
fields.name: Recurrence

fields.description: Number of external references that exist on the task.
fields.name: ReferenceCount

fields.description: Indicates all the requirements specified on the plannerTask. Possible values are: none, checklistCompletion, unknownFutureValue, formCompletion, approvalCompletion. Read-only. You must use the Prefer: include-unknown-enum-members request header to get the following values in this evolvable enum: formCompletion, approvalCompletion. The plannerTaskCompletionRequirementDetails in plannerTaskDetails has details of the requirements specified, if any.
fields.name: SpecifiedCompletionRequirements

fields.description: Date and time at which the task starts. The Timestamp type represents date and time information using ISO 8601 format and is always in UTC time. For example, midnight UTC on Jan 1, 2014 is 2014-01-01T00:00:00Z
fields.name: StartDateTime

fields.description: Title of the task.
fields.name: Title
